text: Ramban () is a town in Ramban district of Jammu and Kashmir in the disputed Kashmir region. It lies on the banks of the Chenab river in Chenab Valley on the National Highway-1A (now NH-44) at about 120 km from Jammu and about 130 km from Srinagar, making it almost the central point on the Jammu-Srinagar National Highway. Category:Towns in Jammu and Kashmir
title: Ramban, Jammu and Kashmir
